name: Justin Driscoll
coverLetter: I have no true experience trimming but I'm a fast learner and a hard worker so I wouldn't doubt I could easily pick up and skills needed for the position and become a valuable asset to your company. I would need Mondays off and though it would be easiest to secure a ride to work after 1pm every day if that couldn't be accommodated I wouldn't accept the position (if it was offered) if I felt I couldn't be reliably able to get to work at the appointed time . It all depends on Time and location.
